text: Ana ve sipisipimo'a hankavenentake hu'neakino kogeno'a, zage fre kazigane, noti kazigane, sauti kazigane vuno eno nehuno, maka zama avugama me'nea zana ome mitre eme mitre hu'ne. Ana higeno mago'a afi'zagamo'za oti hankavetine'za hara hunente'za, agrama ha'ma huzmantea vahera zamagu vazigara osu'naze. Ana hazageno agra avesite nazano hunaku'ma hiazana nehuno hankave nentake afi'zaga efore hu'ne.
